description: Skip to the next iteration of a for, while, until or select loop. More information: https://www.gnu.org/software/bash/manual/bash.html#index-continue.

useCases.syntax: while :; do continue; echo "This will never be reached"; done

useCases.description: Skip to the next iteration from within a nested loop:
useCases.syntax: for i in {1..3}; do while :; do continue 2; done; done
